title: IB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 394 Junior Intelligent Officer Grade-II Posts
description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 394 Junior Intelligence Officer Grade-II Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application.
